bridge-type.label: Luxom Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents a Luxom IP-interface (for example a DS-65L).

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP or Host Name
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the Luxom IP-interface.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Bridge Port
parameter.description: Port to communicate with Luxom IP-interface, default 2300.

parameter.name: reconnectInterval
parameter.label: Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: The period in minutes that the handler will wait between connection attempts after disconnect.

parameter.name: onLevel
parameter.label: On Level
parameter.description: Output level to go to when an ON command is received. Default is 100%.

parameter.name: onToLast
parameter.label: Turn On To Last Level
parameter.description: If set to true, dimmer will go to the last non-zero level set when an ON command is received. If the last level cannot be determined, the value of onLevel will be used instead.

parameter.name: stepPercentage
parameter.label: Step Value
parameter.description: Step value used for increase/decrease of dimmer brightness, default 5%

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Switch control for action in Luxom.
